page.title: 03Peak Dale's Cheeky Monkey
page.content: On the side of the house which I live in (on Batham Gate Road) there is a stone monkey.If you ever come up Batham Gate Road,just near the top of the hill is a row of houses -it is on the house nearest to the road.I think it was put there when the house was built. We get lots of people taking photos of the white monkey.We wondered why they were doing this.One day there was a man taking photos.My mum asked why he was doing this and he told my mum all about it. What happened was that the man who lived in the house when it was first built went bankrupt.In those days when you were bankrupt you had to put a white monkey on your house,and you wouldn't be trusted any more.
